content: As an AI language model, I don't currently have access to the latest data on Freeview's market share in urban and rural areas in the UK. However, according to data from Ofcom's "Digital Radio Report 2021", there is a higher percentage of households that use Freeview in rural areas compared to urban areas. This may be due to a lack of other TV service options available in rural areas, leading residents to rely on Freeview's free-to-air service. However, it's important to note that the report focuses on digital radio usage and not TV usage specifically.
